greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of 2*cos(Pi/9).
comment: This algebraic number called rho(9) of degree 3 = A055034(9) has minimal polynomial C(9, x) = x^3 - 3*x + 1 (see A187360).
rho(9) gives the length ratio diagonal/side of the smallest diagonal in the regular 9-gon.

The length ratio diagonal/side of the second smallest and the third smallest (or the largest) diagonal in the regular 9-gon are rho(9)^2 - 1 = A332438 - 1 and rho(9) + 1, respectively. - _Mohammed Yaseen_, Oct 31 2020
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Mar 27 2020
